trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around November 15th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsMY GIRLFRIEND AND I WERE LEAVING HER HOUSE TO GO TO MY PARENTS.FOR SOME REASON I LOOKED WESTAND SAW THIS THING I THOUGHT WAS A HELICOPTER, BUT AFTER OPENING THE WINDOW IT WASNT.I FREAKED OUT AND TOLD ALEXANDRINE TO LOOK OVER HER SHOULDER. THE BEAM CEASED AND IT WAS AS IF IT HAD KNOWN I WAS LOOKING AT IT. AS SOON AS THE LIGHT TURNED GREEN I TOLD HER TO "GO!". AS WE LEFT SPEEDING IT TURNED IN THE AIR AND MADE A SLOW GLIDE TOWARD OUR DIRECTION. I HAD HER TAKE ALL KINDS OF TURNS THROUGH THE UPPER BLOCKS TO TRY TO GET AWAY.UPON REALIZING AT WHAT WE SAW WE SAT ON THE FLAT ROOF OF THE APARTMENT AND WAITED FOR IT.AT ONE POINT OF THE WATCH WE SAW SOMETHING SILENT , BUT IT SOON DISSAPPEARED BEHIND THE TREE.I HAVE NOT SEEN IT EVER SINCE.I WAS FILLED WITH FEAR AND WAS TAKEN BACK FOR A WHILE.I HAD NOT BEEN DRINKING AT ALL.SINCE THIS OCCURED I HAVE FELT UNEASED AND ALWAYS LOOK UP.
Summary: stationary over a neiborhood with blue beam with silent thrusters
